message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm very interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I'm willing to be flexible, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $128.
I appreciate your continued willingness to work with me, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $108?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $125.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
